pm-agent.description: Product Manager agent responsible for defining project scope, objectives, requirements, and creating the projectBrief.md artifact. First agent in the planning workflow chain.

architect-agent.description: Architect agent responsible for defining system architecture, technology stack, and implementation patterns. Creates architecture.md, techStack.md, and implementationPatterns.md artifacts.

senior-dev-agent.description: Senior Developer agent responsible for researching high-risk technical areas through spike documents. Conducts technical due diligence and provides implementation recommendations.

em-agent.description: Engineering Manager agent responsible for defining high-level epics and detailed epic specifications. Creates epicsHighLevelDescription.md and detailed epic documents, bridging planning and development phases.

developer-agent.description: Developer agent responsible for implementing code based on epic specifications. Executes development work and maintains epic conversation tracking for progress updates.

pr-reviewer-agent.description: PR Reviewer agent responsible for code quality assurance, preventing function duplication through functionMap.md maintenance, and providing technical feedback on implementations.

qa-agent.description: QA agent responsible for defining and maintaining comprehensive test strategies, executing quality assurance processes, and ensuring test coverage meets requirements.
